pr_title: Support distinct error type in balo and jvm codegen

timeline.message: Support distinct error type in balo files
Support distinct types in jvm codegen and runtime

timeline.bodyText: With Type ID, this should contain a version.
timeline.author: hasithaa

replies.bodyText: I didn't quite get you, for this particular constructor version is a constant right?
replies.author: rdhananjaya

replies.bodyText: One assumption in typeID design is, modules always have a version. Maybe we should remove this constructor.
replies.author: hasithaa

replies.bodyText: Ack. Will look into removing this in a subsequent PR.
replies.author: rdhananjaya
